root: ^Ah, the messenger! You are finally here!
^How do I look? "Younger than ever", is the only response I would accept.

c-0: ^ I think so too. Thank you. Anyway...
g-0: ^I need you to deliver this message to our neighbours. We cannot afford to be enemies anymore.
^We don't want any trouble from them. Call it a truce?
^If you gather any information from the enemy, bring them directly to me. I've heard the commander is gate-keeping all information. I should handle that before it...
^By the way, Steve has joined us as an intern for the messaging department. Go find him and take him with you for this journey.
^Sure! Good to have some young blood in our dying department.
^It's dangerous out there, can I take a guard instead?

c-1: ^ Your king commands, Steve goes with you. Your hesitation to follow orders is noted, messenger.
c-3: ^ No, the commander controls the guards. It's better if it's only you and Steve.

g-1: ^Be on your way now. Be safe through the treacherous terrains. May the divine be with you and Steve.

on_return: ^Did you deliver the message to the other town leader?
^ No, I couldn't reach the leader

c-1: ^You haven't been very useful. Get back to your postal deliveries now
g-0: ^ He is preparing for an attack on our town
^ He will consider our request to bring peace

c-2: ^My goodness! I had a hunch but I am not prepared for this,
^messenger. Go away now. I need to collect my thoughts before calling a meeting.
c-3: ^That is wonderful news. Thank you for your service to this town. You are dismissed.
